title: Changing masteries and runes from the league website
body: This is just an idea but I like this idea. On the league of legends website you should be able to change your runes and masteries (and create new mastery pages) from the website.

replies.body: But you can do it in your client...
it is so you can do it on public computers or if they have blocked league of legends( like at schools)
